title: A font for wedding invitations
content:
Hello,  
I stumbled across this website while looking for advice on a font to use for my wedding invitations. I think I have found a script font that I like -Selfish [http://www.dafont.com/selfish.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016053123/http:/www.dafont.com/selfish.font "http://www.dafont.com/selfish.font")? but I need a complimentary serif or sans-serif font. Any help would be appreciated!
author: B2b0510

comments.content:
That thing is so expressive, I'd choose something  
very bland for the second font. Like FF Kievit.

hhp
